BR_text.BRsummary: Horovod build image failure still present
BR_text.BRdescription:
Building the Docker via build-docker-images.sh:
 <denchmark-code>The following held packages will be changed:
   libnccl2
 The following packages will be upgraded:
   ca-certificates
 The following packages will be DOWNGRADED:
   libnccl-dev libnccl2
 1 upgraded, 40 newly installed, 2 downgraded, 0 to remove and 36 not upgraded.
 E: Packages were downgraded and -y was used without --allow-downgrades.
 The command '/bin/sh -c apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends         build-essential         cmake         git         curl         vim         wget         ca-certificates         libcudnn7=${CUDNN_VERSION}         libnccl2=${NCCL_VERSION}         libnccl-dev=${NCCL_VERSION}         libjpeg-dev         libpng-dev         python${PYTHON_VERSION}         python${PYTHON_VERSION}-dev' returned a non-zero code: 100
 </denchmark-code>

comments_0.comment_text:
I guess this is related to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/horovod/horovod/issues/418>#418</denchmark-link>
  <denchmark-link:https://github.com/horovod/horovod/pull/420>#420</denchmark-link>

comments_1.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mr-ubik>@mr-ubik</denchmark-link>
 , sorry about that, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/horovod/horovod/pull/741>#741</denchmark-link>
  should address it.  We'll update to newer NCCL with the upcoming Horovod release.
